channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report X-2023081804
item.description:
Report X-2023081804

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-13T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-22
  • City: BROOMFIELD
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This pkg was discovered by an outbound unload manager. The pkg was placed in a red tote and stored in QA1. DescribePack: One of the caps was loose to the touch. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat was placed in a red tote.

item.title: Report X-2023080892
item.description:
Report X-2023080892

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-06
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023080892 SequenceEvent: Package discovered lekaing contents. Placed in tote and brought to damages. DescribePack: Found 2 bottles with broken cracked lids allowing content loss from both bottles. 2L from one and 1L from the other. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: All contents contained in tote. 2. X-2023080893 SequenceEvent: Package was found leaking while in unload. Placed in tote and brought to damages for inspection. DescribePack: Found one bottle had spilled 2L due to a broken cracked lid. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: All contents contained in tote.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: A Fully regulated package came to QA wet and soiled after inspection loose caps on bottles caused the spill soiling the box and other contents in the box DescribePack: loose caps on bottles caused the spill DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was brought to QA for inspection
